level.heading: Funding.
level.text: There is authorized to be appropriated from the general revenues of the District of Columbia funds necessary to carry out the purposes of this subchapter.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Oct. 26, 1974, Pub. L. 93-471, title VIII, ยง 806, as added Oct. 1, 2002, D.C. Law 14-190, ยง 2202, 49 DCR 6968.)
